pyftsubset path/to/font/file --unicodes=0020-007E,00A0-00FF,0152,0153,017F,018F,0192,0259,02C6-02CC,02D8-02DD,0300-030C,0327,0391-03A1,03A3-03A9,03B1-03C9,2007,2009-200B,2011-2015,2018-201A,201C-201E,2020-2022,2026,202F,2030-2031,2032-2033,2039-203A,203C-203D,2044,2047-2049,2190-2199,21D0-21D3,2200,2202-2203,2206,2212,2215,221A,221E,2248,2260,2261,2264-2265,2318,2325-2326,232B,25A0-25A1,25AA-25AB,25B2-25BA,25BC-25C4,25C6,25C9-25CC,25CF,25D8-25D9,25E6,2610-2611,263A-263C,263F-2642,2660,2663,2665,2666,266A-266B,2752,275B-2760,2E18,2E3A,2E3B --layout-features=liga,smcp,c2sc,onum,tnum,pnum,lnum,ordn,frac,zero,ss02,ss03,ss04,ss06,ss09,ss10 --output-file=path/to/output/file
